Log In to Domain Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select Domain»Log In in the Domain Account Manager to display this dialog box. You also can right-click the domain name in the domain list and select Log In from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to log in to the selected domain.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • User name—Specifies the name of the current user.
  • Password—Specifies the password for the current user.
  • Domain—Displays the name of the selected domain you want to log in to.
